column1: Kata Robata////I ordered a longhorn roll to go
column2: and my surprised when I got home was
column3: there were 6 tiny tiny ugly looking pieces of sushi with a gas station-like packing. Paid 15$+. That is not important if the sushi tastes like heaven but this one definitely didn't have anything special. HEB sushi tastes better. I am a big sushi eater and have tried several places everywhere I go. Super disappointed. Not recommended
